summary: "Alice in Borderland" is a Japanese sci-fi thriller TV series on Netflix, based on a manga. In an abandoned Tokyo, Kento Yamazaki and Tao Tsuchiya play allies trapped and forced to play deadly games represented by playing cards to avoid being killed by lasers. Shot in Shibuya, the show has impressive visual effects and music. The first season, released in 2020, got good reviews and was compared to other survival stories like "Battle Royale." It was renewed for a third season in 2023 after the success of the first two.
title: Alice in Borderland (TV series)
